hibernate-mapping.sql-query:
SELECT sci.STUDENT_ID AS STUDENT_ID, stu.ADMISSION_NO AS ADMISSION_NO, stu.NAME_WT_INITIALS AS NAME_WT_INITIALS, gs.GRADE_SUBJECT_ID AS GRADE_SUBJECT_ID, sm.STUDY_MEDIUM_NAME AS STUDY_MEDIUM, stm.IS_ABSENT AS IS_ABSENT, stm.MARKS AS MARKS, stms.TOTAL AS TOLTAL, stms.AVERAGE AS AVERAGE, stms.RANK AS RANK FROM STUDENT_TERM_MARK stm, STUDENT_CLASS_INFO sci, TERM t, GRADE_SUBJECT gs, SUBJECT as s, STUDENT stu, STUDENT_TERM_MARKS_SUMMERY stms, STUDY_MEDIUM sm
WHERE stm.STUDENT_CLASS_INFO_ID=sci.STUDENT_CLASS_INFO_ID AND t.TERM_ID=stm.TERM_ID AND gs.GRADE_SUBJECT_ID=stm.GRADE_SUBJECT_ID AND s.SUBJECT_ID=gs.SUBJECT_ID AND stu.STUDENT_ID=sci.STUDENT_ID AND stms.STUDENT_CLASS_INFO_ID = sci.STUDENT_CLASS_INFO_ID AND t.TERM_ID= stms.TERM_ID AND stu.LANGUAGE_ID=sm.STUDY_MEDIUM_ID AND year(sci.YEAR) = ? AND stm.TERM_ID= ? AND sci.CLASS_GRADE_ID= ? ORDER BY STUDENT_ID
hibernate-mapping.query: FROM com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.StudentTermMarksSummery stms WHERE year(studentClassInfo.year) = ? AND term.termId = ? AND studentClassInfo.classGrade.classGradeId =? ORDER BY studentClassInfo.studentClassInfoId
FROM com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.StudentTermMarksSummery stms WHERE studentClassInfo.student.studentId = ? AND year(studentClassInfo.year) = ?

SELECT stms.average FROM com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.StudentTermMarksSummery stms WHERE stms.studentClassInfo.classGrade.classGradeId = ? AND stms.term.termId = ? AND stms.studentClassInfo.year = ? AND stms.rank = 1

SELECT stms.term.termId,stms.average FROM com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.StudentTermMarksSummery stms WHERE stms.studentClassInfo.classGrade.classGradeId = ? AND stms.studentClassInfo.year = ? AND stms.rank = 1

from com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.StudentTermMarksSummery studentTermMarksSummery where studentTermMarksSummery.studentClassInfo.studentClassInfoId in (:studentClassInfoIds) and studentTermMarksSummery.term.termId = :termId

SELECT studentTermMarksSummery from com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.StudentTermMarksSummery studentTermMarksSummery, com.virtusa.akura.api.dto.StudentClassInfo classinfo where studentTermMarksSummery.studentClassInfo.studentClassInfoId = classinfo.studentClassInfoId and classinfo.classGrade.classGradeId = ? and year(classinfo.year) = ? and studentTermMarksSummery.term.termId = ? order by classinfo.student.lastName
